review: Please add USB drive support. The installed memory is just not enough if you install many apps, mine is now full.  I should not have to root this to add a USB hard drive. Android supports this with no issues.Otherwise the Fire TV is a great little device and beats the pants off of Apple TV, Roku or Google stick.Will change to 5 stars after USB drive support is added.
author: Jeffrey

review: Technology and user interface is amazing. We have Apple TV as well and AMAZON TV Puts it to shame. Voice recognition is so fast and easy to use!!
author: Monty2112

review: I've had fire tv for about 1 week.  So far it has performed well.  I gave it 3 stars because I can't comment on the long term performance.  I've had 2 previous ROKU units that were extremely poor.  They didn't pick up the wi-fi signal from my modem well and lasted only a few months.  So far, the fire tv unit is recognizing the wi-fi signal quite well and streams well.Technology makes me crazy.  I don't understand it very well and don't want to.  The fire tv connected easily.  I only use it for Netflix so far.  Probably that's all I ever will use it for.
author: OG

review: l really thought that AMAZON FIRE TV would let me see contemporary TV over wireless networks.  NO!!  I get only OLDER TV shows and movies.  OK, I can live with that, but not being able to see UP TO DATE versions of CSI or CASTLE or whatever --- NOT what I expected.  AND I thought with PRIME that everything was FREE!!  NOT!!  Old CSI is free, but the most recent -- even with PRIME -- there is a charge after the first episode on the most recent.  Well I bought it, I will keep it.  But who misled me -- friends or ads?
